column4: can anyone help me out? i cant get AVI files to play in any media player (vlc or movie player) and i have the restricted codecs installed
Do you know how the AVI's were encoded? You might need w32codecs from medibuntu....
yea, i'm not sure, but it seems to be avi's from multiple sources
'sudo apt-get install w32codecs' returns "E: Package w32codecs has no installation candidate"
